    Mesh3 Mesh3.calcUvs()

    Casts all vertices and normals of this mesh to a sphere.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.clean()
    Removes elements from the coordinate, texture coordinate and normal arrays of the mesh which are not visited by the face indices.

    Creates a cylinder on the z axis, where its pointed end is on +z and its base is on -z at a radius.

    Creates an array of meshes, each with one face from the source mesh.

    Creates an dodecahedron, a Platonic solid with 12 faces and 20 coordinates.

    Extrudes an edge, creating a new quadrilateral tangent to the edge.

    Extrudes a face by an amount.

    Extrudes a face by an amount.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.extrudeFaces​(boolean fillCap, float depth)
    Extrudes all faces in the mesh by an amount.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.extrudeFaces​(boolean fillCap, float depth, float taper)
    Extrudes all faces in the mesh by an amount.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.flipNormals()
    Negates all normals in this mesh.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.fromObj​(java.lang.String[] lines, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a mesh from an array of strings representing a WaveFront obj file.

    Files supplied to this parser should always include information for coordinates, texture coordinates and normals.
    static Mesh3[] Mesh3.fromObjGroup​(java.lang.String[] lines, boolean poolData)
    Creates an array of meshes from an array of strings representing a WaveFront .obj file with groups.

    Files supplied to this parser should always include information for coordinates, texture coordinates and normals.
    Mesh3 MeshEntity3.get​(int i)
    Gets a mesh from this mesh entity.
    static Mesh3[] Mesh3.groupByMaterial​(Mesh3[] meshes)
    Groups separate meshes with the same material index into a mesh.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.icosahedron​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates an icosahedron, a Platonic solid with 20 faces and 12 coordinates.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.icosphere​(int itrs, Mesh3 target)
    Creates an icosahedron, subdivides through inscription, then casts the vertices to a sphere.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.icosphere​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates an icosahedron, subdivides through inscription, then casts the vertices to a sphere.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.insetExtrudeFace​(int faceIdx, float inset, float depth)
    A convenience function to inset a face at an index and extrude it.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.insetExtrudeFace​(int faceIdx, float inset, float depth, float taper)
    A convenience function to inset a face at an index and extrude it.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.insetExtrudeFaces​(float inset, float depth)
    A convenience function to inset and then extrude all faces of the mesh.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.insetExtrudeFaces​(float inset, float depth, float taper)
    A convenience function to inset and then extrude all faces of the mesh.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.insetFace​(int faceIdx)
    Insets a face by calculating its center then easing from the face's vertices toward the center by 0.5.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.insetFace​(int faceIdx, float fac)
    Insets a face by calculating its center then easing from the face's vertices toward the center by the factor.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.insetFaces()
    Insets all faces in the mesh once.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.insetFaces​(int itr)
    Insets all faces in the mesh for a given number of iterations by a factor of 0.5 .
    Mesh3 Mesh3.insetFaces​(int itr, float fac)
    Insets all faces in the mesh for a given number of iterations by a factor in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.octahedron​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates an octahedron, a Platonic solid with 8 faces and 6 coordinates.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.reframe​(Transform3 tr)
    Centers the mesh about the origin, (0.0, 0.0, 0.0), and rescales it to the range [-0.5, 0.5] .
    Mesh3 MeshEntity3.removeAt​(int i)
    Removes a mesh at a given index.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.removeFace​(int faceIdx)
    Removes a face indices from this mesh beginning at an index.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.removeFaces​(int faceIdx, int count)
    Removes a given number of face indices from this mesh beginning at an index.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotate​(float radians, Vec3 axis)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around an arbitrary axis.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotate​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by a quaternion.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotateX​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around the x axis.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotateY​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around the y axis.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around the z axis.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.scale​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a uniform scalar.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.scale​(Vec3 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a non-uniform scalar.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.set​(int[][][] faces, Vec3[] coords, Vec2[] texCoords, Vec3[] normals)
    Sets the mesh's data by reference, not by value.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.set​(Mesh2 source)
    Sets this mesh to a copy of the source.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.set​(Mesh3 source)
    Sets this mesh to a copy of the source.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.shade()
    Calculates the normals of a mesh.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.shadeFlat()
    Calculates this mesh's normals per face, resulting in flat shading.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.shadeFlat​(int faceIdx)
    Calculates a per face normal for a given face, resulting in flat shading.

    An individual face version of this function is defined because extrudeFace(int, boolean, float, float) needs it.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.shadeSmooth()
    Calculates this mesh's normals per vertex, resulting in smooth shading.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.sphere​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a sphere; defaults to a UV sphere.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.square​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a square.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.square​(PolyType poly, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a square.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.subdivFace​(int faceIdx)
    Subdivides a convex face.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.subdivFaceCenter​(int faceIdx)
    Subdivides a convex face by calculating its center, subdividing each of its edges with one cut to create a midpoint, then connecting the midpoints to the center.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.subdivFaceFan​(int faceIdx)
    Subdivides a convex face by calculating its center, then connecting its vertices to the center.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.subdivFaceInscribe​(int faceIdx)
    Subdivides a convex face by cutting each of its edges once to create a midpoint, then connecting each midpoint.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.subdivFaces()
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh once.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.subdivFaces​(int itr)
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh by a number of iterations.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.subdivFacesCenter​(int itr)
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh by a number of iterations.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.subdivFacesFan​(int itr)
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh by a number of iterations.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.subdivFacesInscribe​(int itr)
    Subdivides all faces in the mesh by a number of iterations.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.tetrahedron​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a tetrahedron, a Platonic solid with 4 faces and 4 coordinates.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.toOrigin​(Transform3 tr)
    Centers the mesh about the origin, (0.0, 0.0, 0.0), by calculating its dimensions then subtracting the center point.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.torus​(float thickness, int sectors, int panels, PolyType poly, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a torus, or doughnut.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.torus​(float thickness, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a torus, or doughnut.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.torus​(int sectors, int panels, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a torus, or doughnut.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.torus​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a torus, or doughnut.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.tracePerimeter​(Mesh3 source, int count, float offset, Mesh3 target)
    Traces the perimeter of each face of the source mesh.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.transform​(Mat4 m)
    Transforms all coordinates in the mesh by a matrix.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.transform​(Transform3 tr)
    Transforms all coordinates in the mesh permanently by a transform.

    Not to be confused with the temporary transformations applied by a mesh entity's transform to the meshes contained within the entity.

    Useful when consolidating multiple mesh entities into one mesh entity.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.translate​(Vec3 v)
    Translates all coordinates in the mesh by a vector.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.uniformData​(Mesh3 source, Mesh3 target)
    Restructures the mesh so that each face index refers to unique data, indifferent to redundancies.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.uvSphere​(int longitudes, int latitudes, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a UV sphere.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.uvSphere​(int longitudes, int latitudes, PolyType poly, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a UV sphere.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.uvSphere​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a UV sphere.
